mapper.select: SELECT o.payment_no AS paymentNo , o.orders_no AS ordersNo , gc.goods_no AS goodsNo , gc.category_no AS categoryNo , o.orders_amount AS ordersAmount , gc.goods_title AS goodsTitle , gc.goods_memo AS goodsMemo , gc.goods_price AS goodsPrice , gc.category_title AS categoryTitle , gc.goodsFileName AS goodsFileName FROM orders o INNER JOIN (SELECT g.goods_title goods_title , g.goods_memo goods_memo , g.goods_price goods_price , gc.goods_no goods_no , ct.category_no category_no , ct.category_title category_title , IFNULL(gf.goods_file_name, 'no file') goodsFileName FROM category ct INNER JOIN goods_category gc ON gc.category_no = ct.category_no INNER JOIN goods g ON gc.goods_no = g.goods_no LEFT outer JOIN goods_file gf ON gc.goods_no = gf.goods_no) gc ON o.goods_no = gc.goods_no WHERE o.payment_no = #{paymentNo}
